message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $90 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $100?
I'm not sure I can go up to $100, but I'm willing to meet you at $95. That's the highest I can go.
